lyrics_abstract:
Will Ferrell:
We're gonna skate to one song, one song only

Jay-Z:
Ball so hard motherfuckers wanna find me

So I ball so hard, motherfuckers wanna find me, first niggas gotta find me
What's fifty grand to a motherfucker like me, can you please remind me?
Ball so hard, this shit crazy, y'all don't know that don't shit phase me
The Nets could go 0 for 82 and I look at you like this shit gravy
Ball so hard, this shit weird, we ain[...]
